title: PRINCE2 Certification Preparation - Fundamental Concepts
headline: In this free online course learn about the PRINCE2 Certification and how other project management tools are related.
description: PRINCE2 is a process-based strategy for effective project management and one of the most widely recognized tools in application today. Project management professionals can build a sound understanding of its foundations through this unique course which aims to help develop concepts around PRINCE2's principles, themes and processes. It will also help you understand the importance of integrating it with other project management tools.
courseDescription:
Project management is one of the most sought-after jobs in the corporate sector. A project management professional must be competent, dedicated and professional in their work. To develop these qualities, individuals may enroll in many training programs available. However, we can distinguish one method, PRINCE2 (Projects in Controlled Environment), the most widely recognized tool.

By understanding the importance of this technique in the professional development of individuals and in streamlining the business processes, a team of experts at Exoexcellence Consultants has developed this concise course revolving around PRINCE2. Throughout, they will introduce you to different aspects of PRINCE2, the way it works and the diverse career paths you can choose after achieving this certification.

The course has a topic dedicated to teaching you about the configuration of PRINCE2, its principles, themes and products. Lastly, it mentions several other project management tools, i.e., Agile, Kanban, SCRUM and Lean. You will learn about the individual characteristics of each topic and the benefits of collaborating these tools with PRINCE2. The course also contains a lesson summary and a course assessment to reinforce your newly learned skills. Register today!

Start Course Now
